what did you think of the president's speech
"our journey moves forward our future is hopeful and the state of our union will always be strong "
"as long as we’re joined in common purpose as long as we maintain our common resolve "
"this nation is great because we worked as a team this nation is great because we get each other’s backs "
"no one built this country on their own this nation is great because we built it together "
president obama "those of us who’ve been sent here to serve can learn from the service of our troops "
"tonight i’m proposing a veterans job corps that will help our communities hire veterans as cops and firefighters "
"as they come home we must serve them as well as they've served us "
"above all our freedom endures because of the men and women in uniform who defend it "
"anyone who tells you that america is in decline or that our influence has waned doesn’t know what they’re talking about "
"and we will safeguard america’s own security against those who threaten our citizens our friends and our interests "
"we will support policies that lead to strong and stable democracies and open markets because tyranny is no match for liberty "
president obama "ending the iraq war has allowed us to strike decisive blows against our enemies "
"with or without this congress i will keep taking actions that help the economy grow but i can do a whole lot more with your help "
"send me a bill that bans insider trading by members of congress and i will sign it tomorrow "
"some of this has to do with the corrosive influence of money in politics "
"but the divide between this city and the rest of the country is at least as bad—and it seems to get worse every year "
"i’ve talked tonight about the deficit of trust between main street and wall street "
"on the other hand if you make under $250 000 a year like 98% of american families your taxes shouldn’t go up "
"tax reform should follow the buffett rule if you make more than $1 million a year you should not pay less than 30% in taxes "
"do we want to keep these tax cuts for the wealthiest americans or do we want to keep our investments in everything else "
"right now warren buffett pays a lower tax rate than his secretary "
"so let’s agree right here right now no side issues no drama pass the payroll tax cut without delay "
"right now our most immediate priority is stopping a tax hike on 160 million working americans while the recovery is still fragile "
"today american consumers finally have a watchdog in richard cordray with one job to look out for them "
"and i will not go back to the days when wall street was allowed to play by its own set of rules "
"i will not go back to the days when health insurance companies had unchecked power to cancel your policy "
"it’s time to apply the same rules from top to bottom no bailouts no handouts and no copouts "
"millions of americans who work hard and play by the rules every day deserve a government and a financial system that do the same "
"i’m sending this congress a plan that gives every responsible homeowner the chance to save about $3 000 a year on their mortgage "
"building this new energy future should be just one part of a broader agenda to repair america’s infrastructure "
"i’m directing my administration to allow the development of clean energy on enough public land to power three million homes "
president obama "i will not walk away from the promise of clean energy "
"because of federal investments renewable energy use has nearly doubled and thousands of americans have jobs because of it "
"this country needs an all out all of the above strategy that develops every available source of american energy "
"nowhere is the promise of innovation greater than in american made energy "
"that means women should earn equal pay for equal work "
"an economy built to last is one where we encourage the talent and ingenuity of every person in this country "
"we should be working on comprehensive immigration reform right now "
"join me in a national commitment to train two million americans with skills that will lead directly to a job "
"i’m announcing the creation of a trade enforcement unit charged with investigating unfair trading practices in countries like china "
"we’re also making it easier for american businesses to sell products all over the world "
"it is time to stop rewarding businesses that ship jobs overseas and start rewarding companies that create jobs right here in america "
"we have a huge opportunity at this moment to bring manufacturing back but we have to seize it "
"the state of our union is getting stronger and we’ve come too far to turn back now "
"and we’ve put in place new rules to hold wall street accountable so a crisis like this never happens again "
"in the last 22 months businesses have created more than three million jobs "
"or we can restore an economy where everyone gets a fair shot everyone does their fair share & everyone plays by the same set of rules "
"we can either settle for a country where a shrinking number of people do really well while a growing number of americans barely get by "
president obama "think about the america within our reach a country that leads the world in educating its people "
